job_details.Functieomschrijving:
This role is for a mid-level engineer. The successful candidate will work on a team with other experienced Software and AI Engineers., Hands-on AI / ML software engineer that will apply AI to solutions in the learning space

   Prompt engineering and associated reliab

   Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features

   Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain application systems utilizing AI

   Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards

   Create documentation including system, APIs, data structures, and sequence diagrams

   Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML

   Analyze, curate, cleanse, and split data

   Utilize and apply generative AI within new products / features and for daily productivity

   Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept

   Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes

   Present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies :

   Agile / Scrum

   Operating Systems - Mac, Linux

   JavaScript, Node.js, Python

   LLMs (OpenAI, Anthropic, open-source models)

   Vector indexing / database (RAG)

   Agentic Frameworks (LangChain, AutoGen, etc.)

   APIs GraphQL, REST

   Docker, Kubernetes

   Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI

   SQL (Postgres RDS / Aurora), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)

   Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS

   Monitoring - Prometheus, ELK

   GitHub, IDE (your choice)
job_details.full_text:
AI / Machine Learning Software Engineer

This role is for a mid-level engineer. The successful candidate will work on a team with other experienced Software and AI Engineers., Hands-on AI / ML software engineer that will apply AI to solutions in the learning space

   Prompt engineering and associated reliab

   Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features

   Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain application systems utilizing AI

   Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards

   Create documentation including system, APIs, data structures, and sequence diagrams

   Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML

   Analyze, curate, cleanse, and split data

   Utilize and apply generative AI within new products / features and for daily productivity

   Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept

   Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes

   Present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies :

   Agile / Scrum

   Operating Systems - Mac, Linux

   JavaScript, Node.js, Python

   LLMs (OpenAI, Anthropic, open-source models)

   Vector indexing / database (RAG)

   Agentic Frameworks (LangChain, AutoGen, etc.)

   APIs GraphQL, REST

   Docker, Kubernetes

   Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI

   SQL (Postgres RDS / Aurora), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)

   Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS

   Monitoring - Prometheus, ELK

   GitHub, IDE (your choice)

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes generative AI, LLMs, RAG, and agentic frameworks like LangChain. It also requires building and maintaining application systems utilizing AI, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on user-facing applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical requirements by working with product owners.

job_tasks.phrase: Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the creation and maintenance of data pipelines, a core component of data engineering for AI/ML.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze, curate, cleanse, and split data
job_tasks.justification: These actions (analyzing, curating, cleansing, splitting data) are fundamental data preprocessing steps within data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI within new products / features
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions applying generative AI, which falls under the modeling category, particularly for generative techniques.
Prompt engineering is a key technique for interacting with and optimizing generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
job_tasks.justification: Exploring new technologies and creating proofs-of-concept often involves experimenting with and adapting models or techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain application systems utilizing AI
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core software development lifecycle for building and maintaining AI-powered applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
job_tasks.justification: Documenting designs and implementations is a standard software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Create documentation including system, APIs, data structures, and sequence diagrams
job_tasks.justification: Creating documentation for APIs, systems, and diagrams is a typical software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes
job_tasks.justification: This involves improving operational processes, which is a key aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Apply AI to solutions in the learning space
job_tasks.justification: This indicates understanding the application domain ('learning space') and how AI can provide solutions within it.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI ... for daily productivity
job_tasks.justification: Applying generative AI, even for productivity, involves using and understanding these models.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain application systems utilizing AI
Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
Create documentation including system, APIs, data structures, and sequence diagrams
Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes
Present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization
